name: Endless Trainer
description:
It is a 3D mobile tactical game. Trainers will clear chapters and receive rewards automatically at any time. There are hundreds of monsters with dozens of types for trainers to catch and evolve to different appearances.
[Endless Battle]
The battle shall never stop. Your loyal squad shall dash forward for more chapters and rewards even you are offline.
[Diversity of Collections]
Catch more monsters and rich your collections to activate bonds among monsters, helping them evolve. Each quality and type has its particularity and is irreplaceable.
[Epic Wars]
Join a Gym and battle together with your teammates in Region War, Cross-Server Prime Arena and many other battlefields.
Time to start your journey in the fairy world!
Email address for customer service ：bestgameGM@gmail.com
